name: attagirl
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to praise a woman or girl, or to encourage her to continue: What a heroine! Attagirl! Attagirl, Jasmin!
used to praise a female animal or to encourage it to do something : Attagirl! Good work!
More examplesFewer examplesAttagirl, that's the way!"Attagirl!" she thought."Let's go and have a burger to celebrate." "Attagirl!"
